Articles.Content:
I've named my moons in Ogame game based in KSP haha

I have, Mun, Minnmus and Kerbal.

Just love the game haha o/

It is in Portuguese because i am Brasilian.. But still awesome!
There is a Kerbal add-on for Space Engine, which provides an EVA Kerbal to fly around, although it's at double scale due to certain engine constraints.
